boardgame.description: At the Gates of Loyang is a trading game in which you are able to produce goods by planting them and later selling them to customers. You can use the abilities of some helpers to increase your income or production._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fields, customers, helpers, and miscellaneous objects are represented by cards. Each player receives two of these cards per round distributed by a bidding/drawing mechanism in which you end up with one of the cards you draw and one of the cards of a public offer filled by all players. Additionally, to these cards you always receive one field for free each round._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Placing one good on a field fills the complete field with goods of this type. Each round, one unit per field is harvested. After planting, harvesting, and distributing cards, each player can use as many actions as he wants, only limited by the number of his cards or the number of goods he owns. At the end of his turn, he can invest the earned money on a scoring track, where early money is worth more than late money. The game ends after a certain number of rounds, and the player who is first on the scoring track wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. GATES OF LOYANG: $55.59 Heidelberger Spielverlag Availability: PRE-ORDER - Release date Jan 11th, 2010. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. 5) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

Description: At the Gates of Loyang is a trading game in which players assume the roles of local farmers, planting wheat, pumpkins, turnips, cabbages, beans and leeks in their fields. After each harvest, farmers assemble at the gates of Loyang to sell and trade their vegetables. They deliver to their regular customers or perhaps more lucratively sell their vegetables to passing shoppers. Vegetables can also be traded at market stalls or used for seed and planted in fields. If the farmers need vegetables they don’t have in stock, they can buy them in the shop. Twenty different helpers, each with different skills, are available to assist them. Farmers may use the abilities of these helpers to increase their income and production. The most successful farmer will be the one who moves furthest along the Path of Prosperity within the given time frame. At the Gates of Loyang is a challenging classic game of strategy and economic principles. Contents: 4 T-shaped game boards (with Path of Prosperity and Shop) 12 Satisfaction markers (blue/red) 24 1-Cash coins (small) 14 5-Cash coins (large) 237 wooden vegetable tokens 4 Scoring markers (to show progress on the Path of Prosperity) 2 Starting player tokens (1 larger, 1 smaller) 190 Cards rules *************************** Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! STILL IN SHRINK / BOX in PERFECT SHAPE / Z-MAN EDITION At the Gates of Loyang is a trading game in which you are able to produce goods by planting them and later selling them to customers. You can use the abilities of some helpers to increase your income or production. Fields, customers, helpers, and miscellaneous objects are represented by cards. Each player receives two of these cards per round distributed by a bidding/drawing mechanism in which you end up with one of the cards you draw and one of the cards of a public offer filled by all players. Additionally, to these cards you always receive one field for free each round. Placing one good on a field fills the complete field with goods of this type. Each round, one unit per field is harvested. After planting, harvesting, and distributing cards, each player can use as many actions as he wants, only limited by the number of his cards or the number of goods he owns. At the end of his turn, he can invest the earned money on a scoring track, where early money is worth more than late money. The game ends after a certain number of rounds, and the player who is first on the scoring track wins.
